kpi.name: M1008C217

kpi_info.title: HS-DSCH SERVING CELL CHANGES FAILED DUE TO UE
kpi_info.use: The number of HS-DSCH serving cell change failures due to UE. UPDATED:When the RNC receives RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION FAILURE message from the UE during serving HS-DSCH cell change or a timer waiting for RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION COMPLETE expires.

kpi.kpi_alias: HS-DSCH SERVING CELL CHANGES FAILED DUE TO UE
